Package fr.cnrs.iees.omhtk.codeGeneration

Class AbstractClassGenerator

java.lang.Object
fr.cnrs.iees.omhtk.codeGeneration.AbstractClassGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
JavaCode
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassGenerator, EnumGenerator, InterfaceGenerator
public abstract class AbstractClassGenerator extends Object implements JavaCode
NO factory (subclasses are different) Limited support for parameterized interfaces (generates the class header properly but does not manage parameter types in functions - this must be done by hand)
Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 11 oct. 2022

      public final void addInterfaceGenericParameter​(String interf, String param)
      Add a generic parameter to this class
      Parameters:
      interf - The interface name.
      param - class of the generic parameter. If qualified, an import statement is added to the generator.

      Parameters:

    • getMethod

      public final MethodGenerator getMethod​(String mname)
      Get a declared method. This enables one to add statements into automatically generated methods (e.g. when building the class from a superclass).
      Parameters:
      mname - the method key
      Returns:
      the method generator

    • asText

      public final String asText​(String indent)
      Description copied from interface: JavaCode
      Constructs and returns valid java code as a plain text String. The returned String is assumed to contain lines separated by end-of-line characters so that it can be directly saved to a .java code file.
      Specified by:
      asText in interface JavaCode
      Parameters:
      indent - the String to use for indentation of code lines
      Returns:
      the code as a single String
